categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tobias Sun was a male Human Jedi Master at the Hidden Temple who kept Deliah Blue and Jariah Syn company while Cade Skywalker and Shado Vao met with the Jedi Council.
While waiting, Tobias and Deliah decided to have fun fixing and riding a speeder bike that Sun had been trying to get operational for some time.
During the Battle of Coruscant, Sun led Twin Suns Squadron.
